api-endpoint.desc: Monitor the availability and performance of a service, website or API with different request types.
api-endpoint.title: API Endpoint

browser.desc: Monitor the availability and performance of a website using a real browser.
browser.title: Browser

check-group.choose-type_one: Pick between {{checkTypes}} different types of checks to monitor your services. Choose the one that best fits your needs.
check-group.choose-type_other: Pick between {{checkTypes}} different types of checks to monitor your services. Choose the one that best fits your needs.

multi-step.desc: Run multiple requests in sequence, using the response data from one request to the next.
multi-step.title: Multi Step

scripted.desc: Write a custom script to run any number of requests with custom checks and assertions.
scripted.title: Scripted

browser.desc: Leverage k6 browser module to run checks in a browser.
browser.title: Browser

dns.desc: Ensures a domain resolves and measures the average time for the resolution to happen.
dns.title: DNS

grpc.desc: Use the gRPC Health Checking Protocol to ensure a gRPC service is healthy.
grpc.title: gRPC

http.desc: Measures a web endpoint for availability, response time, SSL certificate expiration and more.
http.title: HTTP

multihttp.desc: Check multiple web endpoints in sequence.
multihttp.title: MultiHTTP

ping.desc: Check a host for availability and response time.
ping.title: Ping

scripted.desc: Write a k6 script to run custom checks.
scripted.title: Scripted

tcp.desc: Ensures a hostname and port accept a connection and measures performance.
tcp.title: TCP

traceroute.desc: Trace the path of a request through the internet.
traceroute.title: Traceroute

filters.search-placeholder: Search by job name, endpoint, or label

alerts.content: Click the {{buttonText}} button to initialize the plugin and see a list of default alerts or visit the Synthetic Monitoring <4>documentation</4> for more information

checks.content: Click the {{buttonText}} button to initialize the plugin and create checks or visit the Synthetic Monitoring <4>documentation</4> for more information
checks.title: Comience a monitorear sus servicios

intro.text: El monitoreo sintético de Grafana Cloud funciona con k6, Mimir y Loki. Mida rendimiento y tiempo de disponibilidad, simule viajes de usuario y reciba alertas antes que sus usuarios
intro.title: Monitoree proactivamente sus puntos de entrada y flujos de usuario desde ubicaciones alrededor del mundo

tabs.as-code-content: Gestiona tus chequeos como código, tanto a través de <2>Terraform</2> como también <6>interactuando directamente con nuestra API</6>
tabs.probes-content: Además de las ubicaciones que proporcionamos de manera estándar, puede configurar sus propios agentes para correr desde dentro de su red o desde una ubicación de su elección
tabs.protocol-content: Enviar solicitudes individuales a través de HTTP, DNS, TCP, PING o traceroute
tabs.scripting-content: Utilice scripts de k6 para monitorear sus servicios de forma flexible
tabs.title: Arriba y corriendo en segundos, no se requiere instrumentación
